mdx.rawBody:
Song: jingidi
Film: Guru sishyan
singer : mano chithra
music : IR
---
Notes: s r2 g2 m1 p d1 n3 S

jingidi jingidi unakku   ingu ennadi un manakaNakku
p  p p  S  S S  SR  RG   G G  R R R  M  G R S S  n

solladi solladi enakku   indha sinnabuthi unakkedhukku
p  p p  S  S S  SR  RG   G G   R  R R M   GR  S RS  n

sandhEgam varalAmA 
nS RG S   n S RGS

kAdhal kiLikku dhEgam sudalAmA
S S    S n  S  RG S   n S RGS

Stanza 1:
arumbu meesa mugathil vaLarndhAl engaLa konjam seendi pArkudhu
Sn  p  nS S  S n p    n S   S    S n p  n  S   G   R  R  S n

chiruga chiruga arugil nerungi kirukirukka pAytum pAdudhu
p  p p  p  d d  mm m   m n2 n2 n2n2n2n2 n2 n2Sn2d d p p

yE konji konji nAn koNdAdidum en vanji kodi nee minjAdhadi
pR R  GR G  G  p   p  p p p   pR R  GR G G  S   SR Snn  n

sindhAdhadi ingu sillaraya en sindhAmaNi adhu sellAdhadi
R  GR G  G  p p  p  p p p  pR R  GR G G  SS   SR Sn n n

ANgaLukku dhAn ingu enna irukku
S G3S  G3 G3   G3S  G3M  G3M M

nalla peNNai thavira indha ulagathilE
M  S  S  G3  S  G3G3 G3S   G3MM M  M

adha sollAdha sellakiLiyE
G3M  P  P D   P  M G R SRSn Rn

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
thurathi thurathi viratti pidikkum pazhakkam ennai sErndhadhillayE
vaLaithu pidithu izhuthu aNaithu peNNai kedukkum eNNam illayE ho
oor kAvalA nAn un kAdhali nee oor mEyavA unn pinnAl vandhEn
kAdhal kiLi enadhan kAval undu siru mOdhal endrAl ingu rendil ondru
bhAmAvukku nAn kaNNanadi 
nalla mAmi veetu maharAjanadi
ennai seeNdAdhey sella kiLiyE
